game_description: Touchly is the next evolution of the VR video player. Turn videos into volumetric, immersive experiences. It features: - Virtual hands that react to the video environment. - Six-degrees-of-freedom playback: Reduce eye strain and move freely with position tracking. - Passthrough mode: Bring videos to your reality. Hologram-like. - Play in most of the common layouts (180/360/Flat in Stereo/Mono) and formats (mp4, avi, mkv, mov, webm). Other features include: - Local streaming: With our new server app Touchly Cast. - Hand tracking support. - TactGlove support for haptics. - Advanced settings: Rotation, position, color adjustment, depth adjustments, etc. - Depth and Color matting for passthrough. - Watch local or remote files with streaming. - Customizable hands. Important note: To watch videos in volumetric mode, they need to be converted first with Touchly Renderer (touchly.app/renderer). Only a couple of demo videos are included in the app.
review_1: This app is fantastic and provides ways of experiencing videos in VR that I haven’t seen anywhere else. As others mentioned, rendering and moving videos to your headset may be more work then some people are looking for - but if you have the time and interest it’s awesome!
review_2: Rating this four stars as it's a great app, but there's a lot more development and support that needs to happen to really make this something everyone can enjoy and not just the experimental virtual hacker crowds. The developer is very active on the discord and takes feedback and suggestions seriously.
review_3: Great movie player. Can't wait to be able to watch 3D movies in 6dof when that feature is added to the converter.
